name: HighLevel Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 HighLevel Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume HighLevel API v2

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume HighLevel API v2 | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: contact | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: bookAppointment

contactCreateNotice.displayName: Create a new contact or update an existing one if email or phone matches (upsert)
contactCreateNotice.name: contactCreateNotice
contactCreateNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Create a new contact or update an existing one if email or phone matches (upsert)

email.name: email
email.description: Lookup Contact by Email. If Email is not found it will try to find a contact by phone.
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Lookup Contact by Email. If Email is not found it will try to find a contact by phone.

phone.name: phone
phone.description: Lookup Contact by Phone. It will first try to find a contact by Email and than by Phone.
phone.natural_language_description: 参数名: Phone | 作用: Lookup Contact by Phone. It will first try to find a contact by Email and than by Phone.

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: timezone (值: None) - The timezone to use for the returned slots. Example: America/Chihuahua.
userId (值: None) - User ID to filter the slots (optional)
enableLookBusy (值: None) - Apply Look Busy to the slots

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: assignedTo (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 20

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: assignedTo (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
pipelineId (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
stageId (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
query (值: None) - Query will search on these fields: Name, Phone, Email, Tags, and Company Name

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}

pipelineId.name: pipelineId
pipelineId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
pipelineId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Pipeline Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

status.name: status
status.natural_language_description: 参数名: Status | 默认值: open | (必填项)

opportunityId.name: opportunityId
opportunityId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Opportunity ID | (必填项)

dueDate.name: dueDate
dueDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Due Date | (必填项)

completed.name: completed
completed.natural_language_description: 参数名: Completed | 默认值: False | (必填项)

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | (必填项)

calendarId.name: calendarId
calendarId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Calendar ID | (必填项)

locationId.name: locationId
locationId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Location ID | (必填项)

startTime.name: startTime
startTime.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start Time | 作用: Example: 2021-06-23T03:30:00+05:30 | (必填项)

startDate.name: startDate
startDate.description: The start date for fetching free calendar slots. Example: 1548898600000.
startDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start Date | 作用: The start date for fetching free calendar slots. Example: 1548898600000. | (必填项)

endDate.name: endDate
endDate.description: The end date for fetching free calendar slots. Example: 1601490599999.
endDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: End Date | 作用: The end date for fetching free calendar slots. Example: 1601490599999. | (必填项)

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
